name: Biliary Dyskinesia
chief_complaint: I keep getting sharp pains in my upper right belly, especially after eating fatty foods
prognosis: Good with dietary management, excellent with surgical intervention if needed
description: A functional gallbladder disorder characterized by impaired gallbladder emptying without gallstones. Pain occurs due to biliary colic when the gallbladder fails to properly contract in response to meals, particularly fatty ones.
